Title: Software Engineer
Description:
Job Responsibilities:

We are looking for a Software Enginner who is proficient in writing clean, well-designed, and logical code. The ideal candidate will be capable of troubleshooting, testing, and maintaining core product software and databases to ensure optimal performance and functionality. You will be expected to contribute throughout all phases of the development cycle, from design to deployment.




Key responsibilities:

- Developing, testing, and maintaining software solutions.

- Troubleshooting and debugging to ensure the functionality and performance of the core product.

- Ensuring that code follows industry best practices.

- Developing and deploying new features to enhance the software product.

- Creating relevant tools and procedures as required for effective software development and maintenance.




Key Skills:

- Programming Languages: Proficiency in C and C++.

- Logical Reasoning and Aptitude: Strong analytical skills and ability to solve complex problems.

- Software Development Experience: 0-12 months of experience in Perl or Python programming.

- Database Management: Expertise in MySQL.

- Best Practices: Passion for best design and coding practices.

- AI Technologies: Keen interest in leveraging AI technologies when applicable.




Qualifications:

- Bachelors Degree in Engineering (BE), Master of Computer Applications (MCA), or Master of Science (MSc) in Computer Science.

Title: Software Engineer
Description:
RBL Bank Ltd is looking for Software Engineer to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
Developing and directing software system validation and testing methods.
Directing our software programming initiatives
Overseeing the development of documentation.
Working closely with clients and cross-functional departments to communicate project statuses and proposals.
Analyzing data to effectively coordinate the installation of new systems or the modification of existing systems.
Managing the software development lifecycle.
Monitoring system performance.
Communicating key project data to team members and building cohesion among teams.
Developing and executing project plans.
Applying mathematics and statistics to problem-solving initiatives.
Applying best practices and standard operating procedures.
Creating innovative solutions to meet our companys technical needs.
Testing new software and fixing bugs.
Shaping the future of our systems.

Title: AI Software Engineer
Description:
We are on the lookout for a passionate Artificial Intelligence Engineer to be a part of our dynamic team.In this role, your curiosity and deep interest in AI, machine learning, and keeping pace with a rapidly evolving field will guide your path. You will delve into extensive data sets, identify patterns, and craft predictive algorithmic models, contributing to innovative projects.
If your a tech-savvy innovator with a drive to make a significant impact in the realm of AI, were eager for you to bring your talents to our team
Â 
AI Engineer Responsibilities
Design and develop cutting-edge AI solutions and systems that integrate with our products and services
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to assess business needs and identify opportunities for AI solutions
Implement and maintain AI models, algorithms, and tools
Conduct research and experiments to improve the performance of AI systems
Develop and maintain documentation for AI models and algorithms
Monitor the performance of AI systems and make recommendations for improvements
Stay up-to-date with advancements in AI technologies and make recommendations for future development

AI Engineer Requirements and Skills

Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
Experience in developing and deploying AI solutions
Proven track record of designing and implementing complex machine learning algorithms and models
Strong programming skills in Python, R, MATLAB, or other relevant programming language
Experience working with large datasets and data pre-processing techniques
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
Excellent communication and collaboration skills
